'''12w15a''' is the first [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.3.1]], released on April 12, 2012.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120413003119/http://www.mojang.com/2012/04/minecraft-snapshot-12w15a/|title=Minecraft Snapshot 12w15a|website=mojang.com}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
[[File:Dispenser (S) JE2 BE1.png|36px]] '''[[Dispenser]]s'''
* Can now deploy [[boat]]s on [[water]], and [[minecart]]s on [[rail]]s (variants included).

=== Items ===
'''General'''
* Stackable items now stack outside [[inventory]] when thrown to the ground individually.

=== Mobs ===
[[File:Slime JE2 BE1.png|46px]] '''[[Slime]]s'''
* Decreased the spawning rate of slimes in [[superflat]] worlds.

=== Non-mob entities ===
[[File:Minecart with Furnace JE2.png|36px]] '''[[Minecart with furnace]]'''
* {{control|Using}} a minecart with furnace in [[Creative]] mode acts as if the player gave it [[coal]].

=== General ===
'''Controls'''
* The appropriate [[spawn egg]] is now given when {{control|pick blocking}} a [[mob]] while in Creative mode.
* {{key|Shift}}+clicking can now be used to equip [[armor]].
* {{key|Shift}}+clicking can now be used to put items in [[enchantment table]]s.
* {{key|Shift}}+clicking can now be used to put items in [[brewing stand]]s. However, it does not work with the third potion slot yet.</onlyinclude>
